com.cloudera.oryx.app.classreg.example

Class NumericFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.app.classreg.example.NumericFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feature, Serializable

    public final class NumericFeature
extends Object
implements Feature
    Represents the value of a numeric feature -- one that takes on a real value, whether conceptually discrete or continuous. For example both integer values like "number of children" and continuous values like "average age" are represented by this class.
    See Also:
    CategoricalFeature, Serialized Form
